name: Haze
description: Your presence clouds the minds of nearby enemies, decreasing their Accuracy.

name: Warding Tome
description: Carrying a Spellbook sharply increases your Defense.

name: Destruction
description: Your attacks ignore Defense from shields.

name: Poison
description: When your attacks deal damage, half that damage is dealt again in one round.

name: Martial Arts
description: You are immune to the Inaction and Grappled conditions.
